languages.text: "Волнующе, правда?" {n}С бесстрашной улыбкой Энрих кладет ваши ладони на рычаги, накрывает своими и уверенным движением тянет их вниз.{/n} "Не переживайте, я не дам ему вам навредить".

"Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."
languages.original_text: "Волнующе, правда?" {n}С бесстрашной улыбкой Энрих кладет ваши ладони на рычаги, накрывает своими и уверенным движением тянет их вниз.{/n} "Не переживайте, я не дам ему вам навредить".

"Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."

languages.text: «Emocionante, ¿eh?». {n}Con una sonrisa intrépida, Einrich coloca tus manos sobre los controles y tira de las palancas con seguridad.{/n} «No tenga miedo. No dejaré que le haga daño».
languages.original_text: "Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."

traits.locale_text: «Emocionante, ¿eh?». {n}Con una sonrisa intrépida, Einrich coloca tus manos sobre los controles y tira de las palancas con seguridad.{/n} «No tenga miedo. No dejaré que le haga daño».

languages.text: 「ワクワクしませんか？」 {n}アインリッヒは精悍な笑みを浮かべながら、あなたの手を操縦席に置き、自分の手のひらで覆い、自信に満ちた動きでレバーを引き下げた。{/n}「怖がらないでください。彼にあなたを傷つけさせはしません」
languages.original_text: "Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."

traits.locale_text: 「ワクワクしませんか？」 {n}アインリッヒは精悍な笑みを浮かべながら、あなたの手を操縦席に置き、自分の手のひらで覆い、自信に満ちた動きでレバーを引き下げた。{/n}「怖がらないでください。彼にあなたを傷つけさせはしません」

languages.text: “很刺激，是吧？”{n}艾因里奇脸上带着无所畏惧的微笑，将你的手掌放在控制台上，将他自己的手盖在你的手上，以自信的动作拉下拉杆。{/n}“不要害怕，我是不会让它伤害你的。”
languages.original_text: "Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."

traits.locale_text: “很刺激，是吧？”{n}艾因里奇脸上带着无所畏惧的微笑，将你的手掌放在控制台上，将他自己的手盖在你的手上，以自信的动作拉下拉杆。{/n}“不要害怕，我是不会让它伤害你的。”

languages.text: "Ist das nicht aufregend?" {n}Mit einem furchtlosen Lächeln legt Einrich deine Handflächen auf die Steuerung, bedeckt sie mit seinen eigenen und zieht die Hebel selbstsicher nach unten.{/n} "Habt keine Angst. Ich lasse nicht zu, dass er Euch etwas antut."
languages.original_text: "Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das nicht aufregend?" {n}Mit einem furchtlosen Lächeln legt Einrich deine Handflächen auf die Steuerung, bedeckt sie mit seinen eigenen und zieht die Hebel selbstsicher nach unten.{/n} "Habt keine Angst. Ich lasse nicht zu, dass er Euch etwas antut."

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire intrépide, Einrich place vos paumes sur les commandes avant de les recouvrir de ses mains, puis il abaisse les manettes d'un geste empreint d'assurance.{/n} « Excitant, n'est-ce pas ? N'ayez pas peur. Je ne le laisserai pas vous faire du mal. »
languages.original_text: "Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire intrépide, Einrich place vos paumes sur les commandes avant de les recouvrir de ses mains, puis il abaisse les manettes d'un geste empreint d'assurance.{/n} « Excitant, n'est-ce pas ? N'ayez pas peur. Je ne le laisserai pas vous faire du mal. »

languages.text: "Heyecanlı, değil mi?" {n}Einrich, cesur bir gülümseme eşliğinde avuçlarını kontrollere koyarak ellerini elleriyle örtüyor ve kendinden emin bir hareketle kolları çekiyor.{/n} "Sakın korkma. Seni incitmesine izin vermeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Exciting, is it not?" {n}With an intrepid smile, Einrich places your palms on the controls, covers them with his own, and pulls the levers down in a confident motion.{/n} "Don't be afraid. I won't let him hurt you."
